Hero.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer specialized in crafting exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on building accessible, human-centered products.

Experience.seniorDesc: Leading the frontend architecture migration to Next.js 14. Mentoring junior developers and implementing a new design system focused on accessibility and performance.
Experience.desc1: Developed e-commerce platforms using React and Node.js.
Experience.desc2: Collaborated on UI implementation and bug fixing.

Projects.project1Desc: A real-time data visualization platform for SaaS metrics, featuring custom charts and dark mode.
Projects.project2Desc: Headless Shopify storefront built for performance and conversion optimization.
Projects.project3Desc: Productivity application for remote teams with real-time syncing and offline support.
